pgTitle: List of games with DirectX 10 support

rows.text: Only supports DirectX 9.0c and 10, updated Patch v1.04.5 to support DirectX 10 on March 25, 2009.
Only supports DirectX 9.0c, 10 and 10.1, support for DirectX 10.1 was removed with patch version 1.01.
Only supports DirectX 9.0c and 10, updated Patch v.1.1.1.0 to support DirectX 10 on June 20, 2007, also release DirectX 10 Enhancement Pack on October 12, 2007.
Only supports DirectX 9.0c and 10, updated Patch v1.7 to support DirectX 10 on May 29, 2007.
Company of Heroes: Tales of Valor
Supports DirectX 9.0c, 10 and 11, updated Module 8 to support DirectX 10 on October 29, 2008 and game patch "Update 7" added DirectX 11 support on October 20, 2010.
Only supports DirectX 9.0c and 10, it was released on 16 October 2007 and was shut down on 7 August 2008.
Only supports DirectX 9.0c and 10, updated Patch v1.3 to support DirectX 10 on June 3, 2010.
Lost Planet: Extreme Condition Colonies Edition
PT Boats: Knights of the Sea
Only supports DirectX 8, 9.0c, 10 and 10.1, updated Patch v1.5.06 to support DirectX 10 and 10.1 on October 29, 2008.
Supports DirectX 9.0c, 10, 10.1, 11 and 11.1. Updated to support new DirectX API on January 5, 2012.
Sword of the Stars II: The Lords of Winter
The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar

Supports DirectX 9.0c, 10 and 11, updated Book 11 to support DirectX 10 on October 24, 2007. Game update "Volume 3: Book 2" added DirectX 11 support. "Volume 3: Book 2" launched September 8, 2010 for current subscribers and September 10, 2010 for new players.
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier
Supports DirectX 9.0c, 10, 10.1 and 11, updated to support DirectX 10/10.1/11 on May 9, 2011.
Total War: Shogun 2 – Fall of the Samurai
Only supports DirectX 9.0c and 10, updated Patch v1.1 to support DirectX 10 on December 23, 2010.
